attributes.action:
Benefits need raised 
Housing crisis needs sorted
attributes.additional_details: To rise the benefits so we all don't have to pick on what to buy treat people on benefits the way use would want
attributes.background: I want parliament to have a look and ask themselves could they leave on what people on benefits has to especially people on pip/dla that can't get out and work  in England and northern Ireland

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure how much you'd like benefits to be increased by, or what actions you'd like the Government to take on housing. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
